item.title: Taask Core on GitHub
item.description: Taask on GitHub ðŸ‘‹ Welcome! Taask Core is an open source system for running arbitrary jobs on any infrastructure. In other words, cloud native tasks-as-a-service. What does Taask Core do? âœ… Runs arbitrary workloads (tasks) written in any language âœ… Runs those tasks in a fault tolerant way âœ… Operates with no single point of failure âœ… Operates on any infrastructure âœ… Keeps task data encrypted, end to end What doesn’t it do?
